ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (ISCHANGED(FirstName) || ISCHANGED(MiddleName) || ISCHANGED(LastName)) && ($Profile.Name = 'Non-Sales User Profile' || $Profile.Name = 'Nokia Read Only' || $Profile.Name = 'Nokia Sales Profile' || $Profile.Name ='PRM Partner Relationship Manager Login' || $Profile.Name ='PRM Partner Community User Login' )
